privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.text: Оur Services instantly connect people everywhere to what's most meaningful to them. For example, any registered user of Twitter can send a Tweet, which is public by default.

cookies.title: Cookie policy
cookies.text: Our services use cookies and other similar technologies, such as pixels or local storage, to help provide you with a better, faster, and safer experience.
